lgshake.name: lg_Shake
lgshake.description: Shake an object in the X and Y axis.

Ä±nitial-state.name: Initial state
Ä±nitial-state.desc: Whether to initially have the behavior enabled or disabled.

shake0.display-text: Shake {my} with magnitude [i]{0}[/i] for [i]{1}[/i] seconds axis {4} ({2})({3})
shake0.description: Shake the screen for a duration of time.

magnitude0.name: Magnitude
magnitude0.desc: The strength of the shake, in maximum pixels to scroll away.

duration1.name: Duration
duration1.desc: The time the shake should last, in seconds.

mode4.name: Mode
mode4.desc: Select whether the magnitude gradually reduces to zero over the duration, or stays constant.

enforce_position7.name: Enforce Position
enforce_position7.desc: Select whether the shake will force object original position to stay the same during and after shake.

state2.name: State
state2.desc: Whether to enable or disable the behavior.
